CurrencyIsoCode.description: The currency code of the forecast submission. If omitted, the default is USD.

ForecastOwnerId.description: The ID of the forecast owner.

ForecastingGroupItemId.description: Reserved for future use. Forecast submissions aren't supported in forecast types with groups.

ForecastingTypeId.description: The ID of the forecast type.

IsLatest.description: Indicates if the forecast submission is the most recent submission.

Name.description: For internal use only. ID of this record.

Note.description: The note attached to the submitted forecast.

PeriodId.description: The ID of the period to which the submission applies.

PeriodStartDate.description: Indicates the start date of the forecast period.

ProductFamily.description: Must be set to none. Forecast submissions aren't supported in forecast types grouped by product families.

SubmissionDateTime.description: The date and time that the forecast submission was made. Calculated internally.

Territory2Id.description: The ID of the territory to forecast on.
